name: Al Wakra Health Center
short_description: Primary healthcare center providing comprehensive family medicine services
timings: Saturday to Thursday: 7:00 AM - 10:00 PM, Friday: 7:00 AM - 4:00 PM
when_to_visit: Visit for routine checkups, minor illnesses, chronic disease management, vaccinations, and preventive care. Ideal for non-urgent medical needs and family health services.
when_not_to_visit: Do not visit for severe chest pain, difficulty breathing, severe injuries, or life-threatening emergencies. These require emergency room care.

name: Hamad General Hospital - Emergency Department
short_description: 24/7 emergency department for urgent and life-threatening conditions
when_to_visit: Visit for severe chest pain, difficulty breathing, severe bleeding, loss of consciousness, severe injuries, stroke symptoms, or any life-threatening emergency.
when_not_to_visit: Do not visit for minor illnesses, routine checkups, prescription refills, or non-urgent conditions. Use PHCC or urgent care for these needs.

name: Al Sadd Urgent Care Center
short_description: Walk-in urgent care for non-life-threatening conditions requiring prompt attention
when_to_visit: Visit for high fever, minor injuries, sprains, infections, moderate pain, or conditions needing prompt care but not life-threatening.
when_not_to_visit: Do not visit for life-threatening emergencies like severe chest pain, difficulty breathing, or major trauma. Go to emergency room instead.
